1.title: Oscars 2018 Best Picture Nominees & MORE!

episode of.title: Pop Talk w/ Luke Frey (TV Series 2018– )

1.plot: Oscars 2018 Best Picture Nominees reviewed including everything from Timothee Chalamet to Meryl Streep. Watch this recap of the nine films nominated for Best Picture at the 90th Academy Awards March 4th 2018.

2.title: Hartford Flavor Company & Dr. Dori Gatter

episode of.title: Pop Talk w/ Luke Frey (TV Series 2018– )

2.plot: This episode is jam packed with excitement including entertainment news, academy awards review, and a new segment called #Whaaaat ? Guests include Dr. Dori Gatter from the West Hartford Holistic Counseling Center who speaks on the issue of anxiety after the entertainment spotlight from Carson Daly and Kevin Love. Also Luke chats with Lelaneia Dubay in the #PopTalkLounge about the Hartford Flavor Company where she explains how the business came to be, along with a fun cocktail making segment featuring some of the brands signature cocktails and the WORLD PREMIERE of the...

3.title: Royal Etiquette & Hartford Fashion Week

episode of.title: Pop Talk w/ Luke Frey (TV Series 2018– )

3.plot: On this episode, Luke invites etiquette expert Karen Thomas to explain what is expected of attendees during the Royal Wedding and how to do a proper champagne toast. Also, Luke chats with designers from Hartford Fashion Week complete with coverage from the Runway.

4.title: Summer Skincare & Yoga From The Heart

episode of.title: Pop Talk w/ Luke Frey (TV Series 2018– )

4.plot: Luke starts out this jam-packed show with his FIRST EVER co-host Camille Ferreira from Mom's Time Out. Also Erina Lander from "A Touch Of Bliss Organic Spa" stops by to discuss healthy summer skincare, plus Diane Couture brings "Yoga From The Heart" to the Pop Talk Lounge to kick off Pop Talk's Summer Yoga Series.
